name: BrainEX (BETA)
description:
BRAIN EX:

I created this game in about 12 days, with some help from friends, check out the credits. Have fun with the game, and why not follow me!

Current Version- 1.0

features- Shooting, reloads, grenades, turrets, zombies (varying health), 4 levels. 

Goals for 1.1:

Optimize the reload station, as it causes long freezes. Implement hand drawn cut scenes to give the game story and narrative.
